title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Do you love building tech that makes a real\-world difference? Are you a skilled Full\-Stack Node.js Developer who thrives in startup environments? Do you dream of shaping the future of healthcare while working with cutting\-edge AI technology?
  
  

If yes, we want you on our team!
  
  

Who We Are
  
  

We are a small top performing team that is changing the way individuals conduct medical research. EvidenceHunt offers an AI\-powered research platform that streamlines the process of gathering, analyzing and utilizing medical evidence. Developed by medical professionals and health\-tech experts, our mission is to accelerate evidence\-based decision making in healthcare by making research simple, effective and reliable.
  
  

Join us and create a lasting impact on the healthcare industry!
  
  

Taken
  
  

As a Full Stack Engineer at EvidenceHunt, you’ll work on exciting challenges that demand creativity, technical excellence, and a love for innovation.
  
  

**Here’s how you’ll make an impact:**  

* Build at scale: Design and develop scalable, reliable back\-end systems with Node.js and integrate them with front\-end solutions using Vue.js.
* Shape the future: Create and improve RAG pipelines and collaborate on game\-changing features.
* Own it: Take full ownership of your projects from concept to deployment—monitor, optimize, and continuously improve.
* Innovate: Work closely with our Tech Lead and CEO to solve complex problems and deliver cutting\-edge solutions.
* Push boundaries: Utilize the power of GCP services and embrace serverless architectures for seamless scalability.


Vereisten
  
  

We’re looking for someone with vision, talent, and drive to help us take EvidenceHunt to the next level.
  
  

**Must\-Have Skills:**  

* Experience: 4\+ years of hands\-on experience with Node.js (TypeScript \& JavaScript). Exposure to Vue.js or similar front\-end frameworks.
* Cloud Expertise: Strong knowledge of GCP or other cloud platforms, including serverless architecture.
* DevOps Interest: A knack for infrastructure, DevOps, and containerization.
* Startup DNA: You thrive in fast\-paced environments having a huge impact.
* Location Flexibility: Able to work in a hybrid setup near Amsterdam (three days from home).
* Databases: Work with both SQL and NoSQL databases to ensure efficient and scalable data storage solutions.


**Bonus Skills:**  

* AI/ML Expertise: Experience with LLMs, RAG pipelines, or AI technologies.
* Experience working with Elasticsearch
* Python Proficiency: Experience with Python for ML/AI applications.
* Advanced Education: A Master’s in Computer Science or related field.
* Serverless Pro: Production experience with serverless architecture


Benefits
  
  

* Competitive Salary \+ Stock Options: Be rewarded for your work with compensation that reflects your talent and dedication.
* Impactful Work: Contribute to a platform that empowers better healthcare outcomes worldwide.
* Tech Playground: Work with cutting\-edge AI and cloud technologies.
* Work\-Life Balance: Flexible hybrid working with an Amsterdam base.
* Incredible Team: Collaborate with people who inspire, challenge, and support you


Ready to make an impact? Join us and help shape the future of medical research!

title: LLM Engineer
description:
**Location:** Utrecht

**Country:** The Netherlands

**Salary:** 65k \- 80k

**Description:**

**Shape the Future of AI in Real Estate**


Are you passionate about using AI to solve real\-world challenges? We are developing AI\-driven solutions for the real estate sector, and as part of our newly established AI Assistant team, you will help build innovative tools that empower NVM members with smarter and more efficient solutions.

**Your Role**


As an LLM Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and deploying large language model (LLM) applications in cloud environments. This role requires technical expertise, creativity, and collaboration to create AI solutions that set new industry standards.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Develop AI\-driven solutions with a focus on real\-world applications.
* Transform prototypes into fully functional solutions that deliver measurable impact.
* Design, evaluate, and refine LLM outputs using advanced performance metrics.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams during Agile development cycles.
* Optimize AI models for accuracy, reliability, and efficiency.
* Present and demonstrate AI solutions to stakeholders.

### **About the Company**


We specialize in data\-driven solutions for the real estate market. As the manager of the Netherlands' largest real estate database, we use AI and machine learning to improve transparency, efficiency, and accessibility. Our goal is to provide real estate professionals with advanced tools that simplify complex processes and offer valuable insights.


Our team consists of over 50 experts dedicated to advancing technology and data solutions. We offer a modern work environment in Utrecht with free parking, hybrid work options, and a strong focus on collaboration and work\-life balance.

### **Ideal Candidate**


We are looking for a driven professional with a strong technical background and a passion for AI innovation. If you thrive in a collaborative and autonomous environment, this role is for you.

**Requirements:**

* Proven experience in LLM application development and cloud deployment (AWS preferred).
* Knowledge of Retrieval\-Augmented Generation (RAG) and prompt engineering.
* Proficiency in Python, machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face), SQL, Git, and APIs.
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines, ML Ops tools, and data pipelines.
* Fluency in English.
* Residency in the Netherlands at the time of application.

**Preferred but not required:**

* Experience with Amazon Bedrock or other LLM providers (e.g., OpenAI API).
* Background in real estate, preferably NVM Wonen.

### **What We Offer**


We foster an innovative and collaborative environment where professionals can thrive. Our technology\-driven approach ensures you work with cutting\-edge tools rather than outdated systems, allowing you to focus on creating impactful solutions.

**Benefits Include:**

* **Salary:** 65,000 \- 80,000 annually, based on experience.
* **Bonuses:** 13th\-month salary included.
* **Vacation:** 37 vacation days per year.
* **Pension Plan:** Premium scheme with only 1% employee contribution via Zwitserleven.
* **Tech Essentials:** Choose your preferred laptop and mobile phone or receive a 30\-monthly reimbursement.
* **Commuting Support:** Travel allowance (0\.23 per km) or 100% reimbursed NS Business Card.
* **Hybrid Work Setup:** Flexible home\-office options with a 2\.40 daily remote work allowance.
* **Professional Development:** 1,500 annual training budget.
* **Insurance Discounts:** Up to 10% discount on health insurance via Zilveren Kruis.

### **Working Conditions**

* Hybrid work model: 3 days in the office, 2 days remote.
* Visa sponsorship and relocation are not available.

### **Company Culture**

* Informal and collaborative work environment.
* Diverse and inclusive teams.
* A culture of trust with self\-managing teams and freedom for individual initiatives.

**Heads up!**  

We’re on the hunt for top talent on behalf of our awesome client! If this sounds like your kind of gig, hit that *apply* button! Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted, and we keep things 100% confidential. We’re all about equal opportunities here—everyone’s welcome!

title: Data Analyst - Insight Generation for High-Tech Strategy
description:
Netherlands Data Science Eindhoven Hybrid
Turn data into actionable insights and drive strategic decisions in the high\-tech industry.

  


About The Member Company
We are a global high\-tech consultancy company with a team of entrepreneurial engineers, scientists, and digital experts from around the world. Together we form a fast\-growing and proud community. We offer consultancy services to high\-profile clients globally in diverse service areas, such as:


* Technology \& Engineering
* Energy \& Renewables
* Life sciences \& Pharma
* Digital \& IT
**About this vacancy**
----------------------


As a Data Analyst at TMC Data Science, you will transform raw data into actionable insights that guide strategic decision\-making in the high\-tech industry. You will create dashboards and visualizations that simplify complex data and support innovation through trend analysis and forecasting.


Key Responsibilities:

* Analyze data to identify patterns, trends, and opportunities.
* Develop intuitive dashboards and reports for stakeholders.
* Conduct trend analysis and create predictive models.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to understand business needs.
* Present findings in a clear and impactful manner.


**What we expect from you**
---------------------------


* Bachelor’s or Msc degree in Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, or related fields.
* 3\-5 years of experience in data analysis or business intelligence.
* Proficiency in visualization tools like Power BI, Tableau, or Qlik.
* Strong analytical and communication skills.
* Knowledge of the high\-tech industry is a plus.


**What you can expect from us**
-------------------------------


TMC is an international high\-tech consultancy company that brings expertise to their clients in order to support them with the realization of their technological challenges. As such, TMC is operating as an expert center at the disposition of its clients and we help them to be more competitive in an ever more global and faster changing technological world.


At TMC we believe that people are the driving force behind technological innovation. That is why we want to create the best possible conditions for tech talents to thrive in. We offer you a challenging and stimulating work environment in which you can be the director of your own career.


As an Employeneur you are part of our TMC family. Next to our outstanding technical expertise, fun and engagement are meaningful parts of our culture.


The 5 basic principles of **employeneurship**
A long\-term working relationship
Enjoy the security of a long\-term contract and a stable source of income while getting the opportunity to work at diverse projects.


Individual profit sharing
Full transparency. That’s it. For each of your projects, you know your hourly rate, your costs, and your individual performance\-based profit sharing, all in order to stimulate your inner entrepreneur.


Business cells
Our employeneurs are grouped in business cells based on their technical expertise. They are small, focused and function as high\-grade knowledge networks. And as buzzing communities of close colleagues.


YOUniversity
Every employeneur drives their own career. Together, we make a plan for personal and professional growth. Receive personal coaching and an extensive training budget to keep developing yourself and deliver outperformance at our clients.

  

The Entrepreneurial Lab
Work on your technical dreams in our lab. Collaborate with others in multidisciplinary teams to unlock out\-of\-the\-box thinking and innovative ideas as well as entrepreneurial skills.

title: Software Engineer II - Geospatial Data Processing
description:
*Ready to help shape the future of digital maps?*  

Our Map Data Processing Team in Map Visualization product unit, transforms TomTom’s raw map data into powerful, cost\-effective formats that fuel TomTom’s cloud\-based APIs. By tackling large\-scale data challenges, we make the world’s navigation faster, more accurate, and more accessible.  

We handle scalability and performance in processing massive geospatial datasets. Our work ensures that millions of end users—ranging from internal TomTom customers such as Map Display API, Premium Map Display and 3D Maps, to external partners like Bing Maps and automotive customers such as Stellantis and JLR. to see up\-to\-date and high\-quality maps. Our pipelines are built on modern AWS infrastructure, combining Java development, scripting, and geospatial expertise to meet evolving customer needs.
### **What you’ll do**

* Improve and extend our map data processing pipeline, which transforms TomTom's map data into rich, fresh, and cost\-effective formats for online map visualization.
* Work in an Agile team that own their backlog, apply Design Patterns, TDD, and SOLID principles, and strive for high\-quality code.
* Write clean, maintainable code using Java and scripting languages (Python, Bash).
* Optimize geospatial data transformations for speed, cost, and accuracy.
* Leverage AWS technologies, GitHub Actions, Docker, and Terraform to build and maintain scalable data pipelines.
* Participate in code reviews, share insights, and learn from senior engineers’ feedback.
* Investigate and fix issues in production environments, driving continuous improvements to our workflows and processes.
* Stay curious: step into new areas within the team’s domain, contributing to design discussions and feature implementations.

### **What you’ll need**

* A solid foundation in Java development (object\-oriented design, performance optimization).
* 2\-4 years of relevant software engineering experience or a comparable academic background.
* Hands\-on experience with AWS or similar cloud services.
* Hands\-on experience with CI/CD (e.g., GitHub Actions, Terraform).
* Basic knowledge of geospatial technologies (JTS, GDAL, PostGIS) or a strong interest in learning.
* Problem\-solving mindset: comfortable analyzing requirements, resolving straightforward issues, and delivering tested, efficient solutions.
* Team player attitude: open to collaboration, learning from others, and coaching more junior team members.
* Communicative and proactive: able to seek out help, clarify requirements, and drive tasks to completion.

**What we offer**  

A competitive compensation package, of course.  

Time and resources to grow and develop, including a personal development budget and paid leave for learning days, as well as paid access to e\-learning resources such as O’Reilly and LinkedIn Learning.  

Time to support life outside of work, with enhanced parental leave plus paid leave to care for loved ones and volunteer in local communities.  

Work flexibility, where TomTom’ers, in agreement with their manager and team, use both the office and home to focus, collaborate, learn and socialize. It’s all about getting the best out of both worlds – we ask TomTom’ers to come to the office two days a week, and the remaining three are free to be worked in either location.  

Improve your home office with a setup budget and get extra support with a monthly allowance.  

Enjoy options to work from your home country and abroad for a set number of days each year, to visit family and friends, or to simply explore the world we’re mapping.  

Take the holidays you want with a competitive holiday plan, plus an extra day off to celebrate your birthday.  

Join annual events like our Hackathon and DevDays to bring your ideas to life with talented teammates from around the world.

description:

Your passion is data and analytics. You want to create value for our clients by uncovering, organizing, and making sense of data. You understand that it is important to build robust solutions. You feel comfortable operating in the sweet spot between business and engineering and are eager to learn more and build robust systems next to our experienced team!

The Analytics Engineer is the bridge between business and analytics. You understand what data can bring to the organization. With your effective communication skills, you help uncover business needs and how to support them with data, reporting, and visualization, enabling data democratization by improving the reliability and accessibility of data products. Check out our website or one of our customer stories to get a more detailed understanding of what we do.


Interested in learning more about how and why the role of Analytics Engineering emerged? You can read this blogpost from one of our Analytics Engineers!

**WHAT IT IS LIKE TO BE A CONSULTANT AT XEBIA DATA**

  

As a consultant at Xebia Data, you will have projects of varying length. Some are 2 weeks, some are 1 year, most are in between. Every project is different, as is every client. We, however, always deliver the best quality possible. It is not always easy, but it is always rewarding. You will have exposure to different companies, different problems, different systems and solutions. You will be surrounded by experts in different fields, and you will learn so many new things in a short time. Xebia Data offers the perfect environment to shine as a data professional.


You will never be alone on this journey. We have all experienced imposter syndrome, had a difficult project, or felt down at times. We know what it takes, we know it is difficult sometimes, and we will be there for you when you need it. We say People First, and we mean it.


Xebia Data offers you great benefits too, of course!

* You can enjoy, for free, healthy lunches and not\-so\-healthy drinks/snacks at our offices.
* You can use the great benefits we offer for your physical and mental well\-being.
* You get a generous tech budget.
* You can build/test/experiment anything you want in our sandbox environments in GCP, AWS and Azure.
* You can attend our Xebia Knowledge Events, a bi\-weekly afternoon where our colleagues present their work and learnings.
* You can work on that innovative idea of yours during the monthly Xebia Data Fridays.
* You have 5\.000 Euros and 6 days of development budget per year which you can spend on anything that will make you a better data professional (starting from your second year).
* You also have a monthly mobility budget to spend on leasing a car, or leasing the e\-bike of your dreams, or getting a NS Business Card.
* Finally, we have a modern and dog friendly office in Amsterdam, Oostenburg.

 **WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR**

  

Within the Analytics Engineering team, we are looking for like\-minded people that we would like to work with. We are not looking for a specific type of professional. We all come from very different cultural and educational backgrounds. We love this diversity, and have built an inclusive culture around it. We do not judge, instead, we care about and support each other. We share a genuine curiosity about what we do, and together we get better at it every day. We look for people with this mindset before anything else. What we value the most is your curiosity and willingness to learn.

  

The Cross\-Skilling program is for candidates with data experience seeking to accelerate their technical prowess and focus on data. You will learn from seasoned colleagues and boost your career! **Do you have hands\-on experience with data, but want to grow into an Analytics Engineer by expanding your technical skills or expanding your knowledge? Then this program is for you!**


The program commences in **September 2025**, starting with a month of training conducted by our colleagues, designed to level up your technical skills. Following this, **you’ll immediately embark on client projects with the support of the Xebia Data team!**


If you already have ample experience working in analytics engineering, take a look at our regular Analytics Engineer role.

### **THIS IS YOUR DREAM JOB IF…**

  

✅ You love creating value by solving various problems with data, in the most sustainable and robust way.


✅ You are trained as a data analyst, scientist or engineer but have a deep interest in data modelling and software engineering best practices.


✅ You are a jack\-of\-all\-trades, who wants to become a true authority in the field by learning new skills and trying out the latest data tools.


✅ If you live in the Netherlands.

  

THIS IS NOT YOUR DREAM JOB IF…

  

❌ You always take the academic approach to data and analytics and find it hard to be pragmatic.


❌ You do not enjoy communicating with stakeholders, getting to know the needs of the business, and formulating sustainable solutions.


❌ You do not want to become an authority. You are hesitant to take a proactive approach and bring your ideas forward.


❌ You dislike sharing knowledge by leading trainings, organizing workshops, or writing blog posts.


❌ You just graduated and don’t have any professional experience.

description:

Imagine being part of the dynamic journey at Qualinx – a start\-up born when three visionary PhD Engineers from TU Delft set out to revolutionize radio chip technology. title: Analytics Engineer – Cross-Skilling program
description:
**DOES THIS SOUND LIKE YOU?**

  

Your passion is data and analytics. You want to create value for our clients by uncovering, organizing, and making sense of data. You understand that it is important to build robust solutions. You feel comfortable operating in the sweet spot between business and engineering and are eager to learn more and build robust systems next to our experienced team!

 **WHAT YOU WILL DO TO MAKE ORGANIZATIONS DATA\-DRIVEN**

  

The Analytics Engineer is the bridge between business and analytics. You understand what data can bring to the organization. With your effective communication skills, you help uncover business needs and how to support them with data, reporting, and visualization, enabling data democratization by improving the reliability and accessibility of data products. In the past our team has implemented software engineering best practices to write production\-grade data pipelines, making high\-quality data available for creating business value with analytics. We enjoy great success in making top organizations data\-driven — just think of what more we can achieve when YOU join our team!


Check out our website or one of our customer stories to get a more detailed understanding of what we do.


Interested in learning more about how and why the role of Analytics Engineering emerged? You can read this blogpost from one of our Analytics Engineers!

**WHAT IT IS LIKE TO BE A CONSULTANT AT XEBIA DATA**

  

As a consultant at Xebia Data, you will have projects of varying length. Some are 2 weeks, some are 1 year, most are in between. Every project is different, as is every client. We, however, always deliver the best quality possible. It is not always easy, but it is always rewarding. You will have exposure to different companies, different problems, different systems and solutions. You will be surrounded by experts in different fields, and you will learn so many new things in a short time. Xebia Data offers the perfect environment to shine as a data professional.


You will never be alone on this journey. We have all experienced imposter syndrome, had a difficult project, or felt down at times. We know what it takes, we know it is difficult sometimes, and we will be there for you when you need it. We say People First, and we mean it.


Xebia Data offers you great benefits too, of course!

* You can enjoy, for free, healthy lunches and not\-so\-healthy drinks/snacks at our offices.
* You can use the great benefits we offer for your physical and mental well\-being.
* You get a generous tech budget.
* You can build/test/experiment anything you want in our sandbox environments in GCP, AWS and Azure.
* You can attend our Xebia Knowledge Events, a bi\-weekly afternoon where our colleagues present their work and learnings.
* You can work on that innovative idea of yours during the monthly Xebia Data Fridays.
* You have 5\.000 Euros and 6 days of development budget per year which you can spend on anything that will make you a better data professional (starting from your second year).
* You also have a monthly mobility budget to spend on leasing a car, or leasing the e\-bike of your dreams, or getting a NS Business Card.
* Finally, we have a modern and dog friendly office in Amsterdam, Oostenburg.

 **WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR**

  

Within the Analytics Engineering team, we are looking for like\-minded people that we would like to work with. We are not looking for a specific type of professional. We all come from very different cultural and educational backgrounds. We love this diversity, and have built an inclusive culture around it. We do not judge, instead, we care about and support each other. We share a genuine curiosity about what we do, and together we get better at it every day. We look for people with this mindset before anything else. What we value the most is your curiosity and willingness to learn.

  

The Cross\-Skilling program is for candidates with data experience seeking to accelerate their technical prowess and focus on data. You will learn from seasoned colleagues and boost your career! **Do you have hands\-on experience with data, but want to grow into an Analytics Engineer by expanding your technical skills or expanding your knowledge? Then this program is for you!**


The program commences in **September 2025**, starting with a month of training conducted by our colleagues, designed to level up your technical skills. Following this, **you’ll immediately embark on client projects with the support of the Xebia Data team!**


If you already have ample experience working in analytics engineering, take a look at our regular Analytics Engineer role.

### **THIS IS YOUR DREAM JOB IF…**

  

✅ You love creating value by solving various problems with data, in the most sustainable and robust way.


✅ You are trained as a data analyst, scientist or engineer but have a deep interest in data modelling and software engineering best practices.


✅ You are a jack\-of\-all\-trades, who wants to become a true authority in the field by learning new skills and trying out the latest data tools.


✅ If you live in the Netherlands.

  

THIS IS NOT YOUR DREAM JOB IF…

  

❌ You always take the academic approach to data and analytics and find it hard to be pragmatic.


❌ You do not enjoy communicating with stakeholders, getting to know the needs of the business, and formulating sustainable solutions.


❌ You do not want to become an authority. You are hesitant to take a proactive approach and bring your ideas forward.


❌ You dislike sharing knowledge by leading trainings, organizing workshops, or writing blog posts.


❌ You just graduated and don’t have any professional experience.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
**Company Description**  

Delta Group established our EMEA operation in 1995 with region headquarters in Hoofddorp near Amsterdam to pursue Delta's corporate mission: "To provide innovative, clean and efficient energy solutions for a better tomorrow. "For nearly 20 years, Delta EMEA continues to dedicate in R\&D to support the most important businesses with advanced energy\-saving technology and solutions.With the acquisition of Energy Systems business from Ascom, a Swiss company in 2003, and Eltek ASA, a Norwegian company in April 2015, Delta has inherited the excellent engineering resources and power design knowledge since 1906 and further development into telecom, industrial and medical markets. It is a significant step forward in Delta’s ability to offer complex high\-power solutions, a broader product portfolio and strengthened Delta's position in the European market.

 **Job Description**  

We are seeking a highly motivated and creative **Digital Marketing Specialist** with a strong passion for AI and a proven track record of success in digital marketing campaigns. In this role, you will lead the adoption of AI technologies within our marketing function, establish an AI\-powered marketing infrastructure, and drive the execution of impactful country\-level marketing initiatives.

**Responsibilities:**

**AI Leadership \& Innovation:**

* **Lead the research, evaluation, and implementation of cutting\-edge AI tools** across the marketing spectrum, includingcontent creation, image generation, video and audio creation platforms, graphic design (e.g., Canva, Designs.ai, Jasper, Copy.ai, Midjourney, DALL\-E 2, HeyGen, Pictory, etc.).
* **Develop and deliver comprehensive training programs** to educate the marketing team on the effective use of AI tools and best practices, including hands\-on workshops and ongoing support.
* **Proactively monitor the latest advancements** in AI and machine learning within the marketing domain, identifying emerging technologies with the potential to enhance marketing performance.
* **Stay informed** about relevant industry trends, best practices, and regulatory guidelines related to the use of AI in marketing.
* **Build and maintain a repository of knowledge and resources** related to AI tools and their applications within the marketing team.

**Establishing an AI\-Powered Marketing Infrastructure:**

* **Establish and lead a dedicated initiative to streamline and automate marketing processe**s through the strategic application of AI technologies.
* **Lead the analysis of existing marketing workflows**, identify areas for improvement, and implement AI\-powered solutions to increase efficiency, productivity, and ROI.
* **Leverage AI\-powered data analysis tools to extract meaningful insights** from marketing data, identify trends, and inform data\-driven decision\-making.
* **Develop and maintain** a centralized knowledge base of AI best practices, case studies, and resources for the marketing team.
* **Ensure ethical and responsible use of AI** in all marketing activities, adhering to relevant data privacy regulations and ethical guidelines.

**Country Marketing Leadership:**

* **Lead the development of engaging marketing materials** (e.g., brochures, presentations, website content, social media graphics, print design) that reflect and strengthen the brand identity.
* **Drive the planning and execution marketing events** (e.g., conferences, webinars, workshops).
* **Develop lead generation campaigns**, track and nurture leads and contribute to the development of lead scoring models.
* **Collaborate with cross\-functional teams** (e.g., sales, product marketing, etc.) to ensure alignment and maximize the impact of marketing efforts.

  

**Qualifications**  

* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field.
* 3\+ years of experience in Digital Marketing, Process Automation, AI\-driven Marketing, or a related field.
* Strong interest in technology, with a particular curiosity to explore and learn about emerging AI/ML tools and their potential applications within a business context.
* Experience with process automation tools (e.g., UiPath, Automation Anywhere, ClickUp,) or other workflow automation platforms is a strong plus.
* Strong understanding of Generative AI technologies and their applications in marketing.
* Strong understanding of marketing operations and principles, such as event planning, digital marketing, lead nurturing, design
* Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, XD).
* Strong analytical skills to interpret data and identify automation opportunities.
* Excellent project management and organizational skills.
* Strong problem\-solving and critical\-thinking skills.
* Fluent English speaking is a must, Spanish proficiency is a plus
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
Job Purpose:

We are looking for a **Frontend Developer** for working on the new user interfaces for Tridion Docs, Tridion Docs Genius and Tridion Sites.


Tridion provides the services and software which empower global organizations to single\-source high\-value content, share, reuse and personalize content in various output formats and in multiple languages across global markets. Through efficiency gains, our customers are able to speed up the time of information going to global markets, drive down the cost of content development and translation, provide more agility for the overall business, and increase customer satisfaction through access to better information.


For this product we are creating a completely new user interface, that is built from the ground up. With a small team of designers and developers; we are building the UI based on React and Redux/ReactQuery, implementing new OpenAPI functions and creating a blueprint for the future.

 **About Tridion**  

Tridion is an intelligent content platform comprised of Component Content Management and Web Content Management modules. It leverages Semantic and Generative AI and allows companies to optimize and automate content processes at scale. They can cost\-efficiently import, create, manage, translate, and distribute a wide spectrum of content types – from highly structured regulatory content to engaging marketing content. Used by the world’s largest brands, our flagship products enable easy discovery and automated delivery of the right information to the right recipient.

  

For more information, please visit: **Tridion**
